text: Olwa yawulila amamoonyo kabu, yabarumania, nabakholela isambo, mana nahelesia buli omukhasi omubano, mana naboolela Yusufu mbu; “Bura imbeli wabu” olwabamulola bawuka nibamukhola omukhongo muno, mana nibeteta emikhono chiabu ni baboola mbu “ Tawe!! Uno shali omundu tawe, uno ni Malaika woluyali”
